title: Media Buyer / Ad Specialist – Facebook, Google & TikTok Ads
job_overview:
Job Type: Full-Time
Start Date: ASAP

? DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXPERIENCE
This is not an entry-level position.
We are only looking for applicants with at least 2 years of real-world experience running and optimizing campaigns on Facebook, Google, and TikTok.
If you do not meet this requirement, your application will not be reviewed.

???? Responsibilities
Create, manage, and optimize paid ad campaigns across Facebook, Google, and TikTok
Research audiences and develop effective targeting strategies
Write high-converting ad copy and collaborate on creative assets
Set up conversion tracking and pixels correctly
Run A/B tests and continuously improve campaign performance
Monitor key metrics (ROAS, CTR, CPA, etc.) and report on performance
Stay current with ad platform updates and best practices

? Requirements
Minimum 2 years experience with Facebook Ads, Google Ads, and TikTok Ads
Strong understanding of marketing funnels, performance metrics, and scaling strategies
Hands-on experience optimizing for ROAS and lead generation
Fluent in English (written and spoken)
Results-oriented, detail-focused, and self-managed

???? Tools You’ll Use
Meta Ads Manager
Google Ads
TikTok Ads Manager
Google Analytics
Slack, Notion, Google Sheets

???? Nice to Have
Experience with Shopify or ClickFunnels
Familiarity with email tools like Klaviyo
Basic graphic or video editing skills (e.g., Canva, CapCut)

???? How to Apply
Please submit the following:

1. Your updated resume

2. Either: A short Loom video (2–3 mins) introducing yourself and explaining one campaign you’ve run, including strategy and results
OR A written explanation of a campaign you've managed in detail, including the goal, platform, audience, ad copy, creatives, budget, performance metrics, and results

3. Use the subject line: “EXPERIENCED MEDIA BUYER – ADS2025”
